channel.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
channel.description: Can anyone tell me if someone work on remake in source of Decay? I didn`t find anything..about; it would be nice that after Black Mesa is released Decay to become mod of Black Mesa, in Decay we see that the anti-mass spectrometer is not only controlled from the control room above; I think that deserves, it`s part of Black Mesa Research Facility too

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: flyaway888
item.description:
https://www.moddb.com/mods/hazard-team1

New updates for Decay Source

Read full topic

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: raw_bean
item.description:
1. As has already been pointed out, the BM team have no plans to remake any other Half-Life games after BM.

  2. As for other source remakes, if you couldn’t find any by searching on the net, chances are there aren’t any. If anyone knows differently feel free to link them. [COLOR=‘Red’]Otherwise, there’s really nothing more to discuss in this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: m4rek
item.description:
CatzEyes93:

I coulda just closed the thread to avoid 59 pages of “will they?!” or “OH PLEASE!”

And the people of the congregation said. “Amen.”

I was too busy laughing at his smiley than to get miffed at his behavior.

shoulda, coulda, didn’t… no wait :zip:

Hear, hear.

And now that you mention it, I went back and looked at it… and burst out in fits of giggles

Read full topic

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:

item.description:
Hey, at least he corrected his signature.

and BTW, you can close the thread.

Read full topic

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
flyaway888:

I said already AFTER BM release; I knew from the beginning that BM team works only on BM mod; Please do not try to impose, keep diplomacy :tired:

I coulda just closed the thread to avoid 59 pages of “will they?!” or “OH PLEASE!”

etb513:

flyaway888:

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=24
“WILL THE TEAM BE WORKING ON REMAKES OF OTHER GAMES ONCE BM IS FINISHED?: Almost certainly not, nor is it likely that they will be working on anything else as a coherent team. The likelihood is that they will go their separate ways and work on separate source mods. They will NOT be working on remakes of Opposing force or Blue shift as others are already doing this at the moment.”

Always read the FAQ stickies before asking those sorts of questions or people go berserk. ^^

And the people of the congregation said. “Amen.”

Dillxn:

I think this dude just tried to tell off Catz, but I can’t be certain.

I was too busy laughing at his smiley than to get miffed at his behavior.

Read full topic

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: flyaway888
item.description:
Solokiller:

I think other people have already made it obvious to you that the BM team won’t be doing that, you should’ve asked in the half-life series section, not here, and you were better off asking on the forums of the PC port.

It is in Half Life series section but you don’t see because of nose

It`s not a problem…after Black Mesa is released maybe they will form a new team; BM contains most of the materials which could build Decay is like a serial movie…like HL 2 and episodes

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: m4rek
item.description:
I still wish the BM team would do Decay… I’m sure a lot of their work so far could be recycled, and the task would be significantly smaller than BM from scratch, but still not a short project.

I just love it because it is designed to be coop, whereas most coop mods and many coop modes are basically just a single player game with 2 people and more/harder enemies.

(But yeah, one can dream right? Guess we just gotta hope someone’ll remake it someday)

Read full topic

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: ZeRo
item.description:
Hahaha I already suggested the creation of this once Black Mesa is released. We might need the source code however. Hopefully the Bm team will see the possibilities of releasing the Black mesa Source code, I mean think about it. So many amazing thins could come out of it. Sven Coop Source anyone?

Read full topic

item.title: Co-operative HL Decay:
item.dc:creator: Lord_Grievous
item.description:
Redundant post is redundant

No, so far no mod team is working on a Source version of Decay. And even if it would be a mod to BMS it would be difficult to code without the BMS source code. Unless if course, BM coop ever gets released.
